mapper.select: select cart_item_id as cartItemId, quantity from `tbl_cart_item` where menu_id = #{menuId} and user_id = #{userId}

select cart.cart_item_id as cartItemId, cart.user_id as userId, menu.shop_id as shopId, menu.menu_id as menuId, menu.category_id as categoryId, menu.name as name, menu.image as image, menu.price as price, cart.quantity as quantity, menu.price * cart.quantity as totalPrice, cart.create_at as createAt, cart.update_at as updateAt
from `tbl_cart_item` as cart inner join `tbl_menu` as menu on menu.menu_id = cart.menu_id where cart.user_id = #{userId}
mapper.delete: DELETE from `tbl_cart_item` where cart_item_id = #{cartItemId} and user_id = #{userId}
